title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 35.2 - Applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 35.2 - Applications

State Regulations

The forms of applications for licenses to act as a title insurance agent pursuant to Insurance Law section 2139 are prescribed as follows: individual and business entity. Notes

ยง
35.2

Adopted

New

York State Register October 18, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 42, eff. 10/18/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
